Xi Jinping.

Xi Jinping is the President of China and has been a prominent figure in global politics for several years. He has a strong social media presence and frequently shares content on various platforms, including Twitter, Weibo, and WeChat. Xi Jinping's official account on Weibo, China's equivalent of Twitter, has over 80 million followers, making it one of the most popular accounts in the country. He often shares official statements, speeches, and policy initiatives, as well as personal updates and photos. Xi Jinping's media presence has been praised for its effectiveness in projecting China's image and policies on the global stage.
